channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: 25 Years of Cook's Essentials on 4 Easy Pay
channel.desc: Celebrate 25 years of Cook's Essentials! Enjoy top-quality cookware and kitchen electricals, now available in 4 interest-free instalments-exclusively at QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Oskia Skincare
channel.desc: Discover radiant skin with OSKIA. Experience British-made, luxurious skincare that blends science and nature for visible results and a pampering, wellness-inspired routine.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Electrical Home with Vax
channel.desc: Discover the latest tech for your home, plus get a helping hand with cleaning chores with our great selection from Vax.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Helene Berman London
channel.desc: Update your wardrobe with classic, feminine fashion and accessories designs from Helene Berman.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: SKINN Skincare
channel.desc: Everyone deserves access to skincare innovations, which is why the SKINN brand creates formulas with a scientific approach, to promote lifelong beauty and wellness.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: L'Occitane
channel.desc: Discover a range of bath, body and home products from Provence, formulated with natural ingredients such as olive, verbena, lavender and shea butter.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Household Solutions
channel.desc: Take the elbow grease out of household chores with our superb selection of products for a shipshape home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Offers End Today
channel.desc: Looking for fantastic offers? Then look no further than our special show, bringing you all the latest deals. But hurry - these won't be around for long.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Marla Wynne Fashion Collection
channel.desc: Update your wardrobe for the new year with gorgeous Wynne Layers fashion from MarlaWynne, featuring layering pieces, scarves and more to help give every outfit the perfect finishing touch.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Fashion Accessories
channel.desc: Complete your look with our selection of marvellous fashion accessories. We've collected together our favourite footwear, bags and fabulous finishing touches from right across our brands.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Style for the Season
channel.desc: Next season's style starts here. Showcasing the very latest in fashion, from fabulous dresses to gorgeous skirts, this show is your ticket to brilliant dressing in a flash.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Lunchtime Show
channel.desc: Join us and our great panel of guests at lunchtime as they enjoy a chat and share a selection of fantastic products from top brands on QVC.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Diamonique Jewellery
channel.desc: Showcasing a wide range of beautiful Diamonique designs in both silver and gold, this show offers an emporium of both the classic and essential looks plus unusual rare cuts and sparkling colours.

channel.desc: Discover Masai Clothing offering designs that combine uncomplicated Scandinavian design with high quality materials to create a wearable, fashionable and comfortable wardrobe for all women.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford Fashion
channel.desc: Tune in for style advice and inspiration from Ruth, plus find everything from a great pair of jeans and a stylish jacket, to chic pieces featuring pops of colour and vibrant print.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Lock & Lock Storage Solutions
channel.desc: Keep your food fresher for longer with innovative storage solutions from Lock & Lock. You can use them in the microwave and even in the freezer, making them the perfect addition to your kitchen.
